description: Information for about current alarms, outages, â€‹and affected business services from OpenNMS Horizon.

panels.description: Outstanding alarms related to business services.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(*)
FROM
  alarms
WHERE
  alarms.eventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/bsm/serviceProblem' AND
  alarms.alarmacktime isnull AND
  alarms.logmsg not like '%resolved%'

SELECT
  bsm_service.name,
  bsmAlarm.lasteventtime,
  EXTRACT(DAYS FROM age(now(), bsmAlarm.lasteventtime)) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM age(now(), bsmAlarm.lasteventtime)) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM age(now(), bsmAlarm.lasteventtime)) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM age(now(), bsmAlarm.lasteventtime))::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
FROM
  bsm_service
JOIN
  (SELECT
    substring(reductionkey from '[0-9]+$')::INTEGER AS bsmId,
    alarms.lasteventtime
  FROM
    alarms
  WHERE
    eventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/bsm/serviceProblem' and
    alarms.logmsg not like '%resolved%') AS bsmAlarm
ON
   bsmAlarm.bsmId = bsm_service.id
ORDER BY
  bsmAlarm.lasteventtime DESC

SELECT
  COUNT(current_node_alarms.nodeid)
FROM
  (SELECT
    node_alarms.location,
    node_alarms.nodeid,
    node_alarms.lasteventtime,
    $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime AS duration_raw,
    EXTRACT(DAYS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
  FROM
    node_alarms
  WHERE
    node_alarms.acknowledged = FALSE AND
    node_alarms.eventuei like 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeDown' AND
    node_alarms.location IN ($location) AND
    node_alarms.categoryname IN ($category) AND
    node_alarms.max_alarm_severity_unack = '6'
  GROUP BY
    node_alarms.location,
    node_alarms.nodelabel,
    node_alarms.nodeid,
    node_alarms.firsteventtime,
    node_alarms.lasteventtime) AS current_node_alarms

SELECT
  COUNT(current_interface_alarms.nodeid)
FROM
  (SELECT
    node_alarms.location,
    node_alarms.nodelabel,
    node_alarms.nodeid,
    node_alarms.ipaddr,
    node_alarms.lasteventtime,
    $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime AS duration_raw,
    EXTRACT(DAYS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
  FROM
    node_alarms
  WHERE
    node_alarms.acknowledged = FALSE AND
    node_alarms.eventuei like 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/interfaceDown' AND
    node_alarms.location IN ($location) AND
    node_alarms.categoryname IN ($category) AND
    node_alarms.max_alarm_severity_unack = '5'
  GROUP BY
    node_alarms.location,
    node_alarms.nodeid,
    node_alarms.nodelabel,
    node_alarms.ipaddr,
    node_alarms.firsteventtime,
    node_alarms.lasteventtime) AS current_interface_alarms

SELECT
  COUNT(current_service_alarms.nodeid)
FROM
  (SELECT
    node_alarms.location,
    node_alarms.nodelabel,
    node_alarms.nodeid,
    node_alarms.ipaddr,
    node_alarms.servicename,
    node_alarms.lasteventtime,
    $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime AS duration_raw,
    EXTRACT(DAYS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM $__timeTo() - node_alarms.firsteventtime)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
  FROM
    node_alarms
  WHERE
    node_alarms.acknowledged = FALSE AND
    node_alarms.eventuei like 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeLostService' AND
    node_alarms.location IN ($location) AND
    node_alarms.categoryname IN ($category) AND
    node_alarms.max_alarm_severity_unack = '5'
  GROUP BY
    node_alarms.location,
    node_alarms.nodeid,
    node_alarms.nodelabel,
    node_alarms.ipaddr,
    node_alarms.servicename,
    node_alarms.firsteventtime,
    node_alarms.lasteventtime) AS current_service_alarms

panels.description: Current outages affecting nodes in selected categories or locations.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT(node_outages.nodeid)) AS amount
FROM
  node_outages
WHERE
  node_outages.resolved = 'FALSE' AND
  node_outages.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeDown' AND
  node_outages.location IN ($location) AND
  node_outages.categoryname IN ($category)

panels.title: Current

panels.description: Current outages affecting nodes in selected categories or locations in percent from the whole monitored inventory.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN
      nodes_by_category.tally > 0 THEN
        100.0/nodes_by_category.tally * node_outages_by_category.tally
      ELSE
        0.0
    END AS percentage
FROM
  (SELECT
    'nodes'::TEXT AS type,
    0.0 AS tally) AS tmp
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT
    'nodes'::TEXT AS type,
    COUNT(distinct(nodeid)) AS tally
  FROM
    node_outages
  WHERE
    node_outages.location IN ($location) AND
    node_outages.categoryname IN ($category) AND
    node_outages.resolved = FALSE AND
    node_outages.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeDown') AS node_outages_by_category
ON
  node_outages_by_category.type = tmp.type
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT
    'nodes'::TEXT as type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT(nodeid)) AS tally
   FROM
     node_categories
   WHERE
     node_categories.location IN ($location) AND
     node_categories.categoryname IN ($category)
  ) AS nodes_by_category
ON
  nodes_by_category.type = tmp.type

panels.title: Percent

panels.description: All active monitored nodes in inventory.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT node_categories.nodeid)
FROM
  node_categories
WHERE
  node_categories.location IN ($location) AND
  node_categories.categoryname IN ($category)

panels.title: Total

panels.description: Current outages affecting nodes in selected categories or locations.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  'ipinterfaces' :: TEXT AS type,
  COUNT(distinct (node_outages.nodeid)) AS tally
FROM
  node_outages
JOIN
  node_outage_status
ON
  node_outages.nodeid = node_outage_status.nodeid
WHERE
  node_outages.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  node_outages.location IN ($location) AND
  node_outages.resolved = FALSE AND
  node_outages.nodetype = 'A' AND
  node_outage_status.max_outage_severity = '5' AND
  node_outages.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/interfaceDown'

panels.title: Current

panels.description: Current outages affecting interfaces in selected categories or locations in percent from the whole monitored inventory.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN
      ipinterfaces_by_category.tally > 0 THEN
        100.0/ipinterfaces_by_category.tally * ipinterfaces_outages_by_category.tally
      ELSE
        0.0
    END AS percentage
FROM
  (SELECT
    'ipinterfaces'::TEXT AS type,
    0.0 AS tally) AS tmp
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT
    'ipinterfaces'::TEXT AS type,
    COUNT(distinct (node_outages.nodeid)) AS tally
  FROM
    node_outages
  JOIN
    node_outage_status
  ON
    node_outages.nodeid = node_outage_status.nodeid
  WHERE
    node_outages.categoryname IN ($category) AND
    node_outages.location IN ($location) AND
    node_outages.resolved = FALSE AND
    node_outages.nodetype = 'A' AND
    node_outage_status.max_outage_severity = '5' AND
    node_outages.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/interfaceDown') AS ipinterfaces_outages_by_category
ON
  ipinterfaces_outages_by_category.type = tmp.type
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT
    'ipinterfaces'::TEXT AS type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT(nis.ip_if_id)) AS tally
  FROM
    node_ip_services nis
  WHERE
    nis.if_svc_status = 'A' AND
    nis.categoryname IN ($category)) AS ipinterfaces_by_category
ON
  ipinterfaces_by_category.type = tmp.type

panels.title: Percentage

panels.description: All active monitored IP interfaces in inventory.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT(nis.ip_if_id)) AS tally
FROM
  node_ip_services nis
WHERE
  nis.if_svc_status = 'A' AND
  nis.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  nis.location IN ($location)

panels.title: Total

panels.description: Current outages affecting services in selected categories or locations.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  'services' :: TEXT AS type,
  COUNT(DISTINCT (servicename)) AS tally
FROM
  node_outages
  JOIN
  node_outage_status
    ON
      node_outages.nodeid = node_outage_status.nodeid
WHERE
  node_outages.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  node_outages.location IN ($location) AND
  node_outages.resolved = FALSE AND
  node_outages.nodetype = 'A' AND
  node_outage_status.max_outage_severity = '5' AND
  node_outages.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeLostService'

panels.title: Current

panels.description: Current outages affecting services in selected categories or locations in percent from the whole monitored inventory.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN
      services_by_category.tally > 0 THEN
        100.0/services_by_category.tally * service_outages_by_category.tally
      ELSE
        0.0
  END AS percentage
FROM
  (SELECT
    'services'::TEXT AS type,
    0.0 AS tally) AS tmp
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT
    'services'::TEXT AS type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT(node_outages.serviceid)) AS tally
  FROM
    node_outages
  JOIN
    node_outage_status
  ON
    node_outages.nodeid = node_outage_status.nodeid
  WHERE
    node_outages.categoryname IN ($category) AND
    node_outages.categoryname IN ($location) AND
    node_outages.resolved = FALSE AND
    node_outages.nodetype = 'A' AND
    node_outage_status.max_outage_severity = '5' AND
    node_outages.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeLostService') AS service_outages_by_category
ON
  service_outages_by_category.type = tmp.type
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT
    'services'::TEXT as type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT(node_ip_services.if_svc_id)) AS tally
   FROM
     node_ip_services
   WHERE
     node_ip_services.categoryname IN ($category) AND
     node_ip_services.if_svc_status = 'A' ) AS services_by_category
ON
  services_by_category.type = tmp.type

panels.title: Percentage

panels.description: All active monitored services in inventory.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT(nis.if_svc_id)) AS tally
FROM
  node_ip_services nis
WHERE
  nis.if_svc_status = 'A' AND
  nis.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  nis.location IN ($location)

list.query: SELECT 'no category'::TEXT as categoryname UNION SELECT categoryname FROM categories ORDER BY categoryname
